channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Debian Package Builder Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Debian Package Builder Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-23118|2024-08-03T03:36:19.962Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20debian%20package%20builder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Debian Package Builder Plugin 1.6.11 and earlier implements functionality that allows agents to invoke command-line `git` at an attacker-specified path on the controller, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller.
